sentence.Network_en: Chantal would have considered it ill-mannered to show surprise.
sentence.Network_cn: 钱特尔会认为表现出吃惊是失态的。

sentence.Network_en: The British are considered ill-mannered, badly dressed and unsophisticated.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国人被认为缺乏教养、衣着邋遢、头脑简单。

sentence.Network_en: The Englishman thinks it is ill - mannered to ask personal questions.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国人认为询问个人的事情是没有礼貌的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1997年考研英语阅读理解真题解析... ... 4. small-minded 心胸狭窄的 5. ill-mannered 无礼的 6. be hardly known 几乎无人知道.
rude的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... Ill-mannered;discourteous: 没礼貌的（ill-mannered）；粗鲁的： rude behavior. 粗鲁的行为.
新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... undeclared 未经宣布的 ill-mannered 举止粗鲁的 good-tempered 脾气好的.
商志3147词汇部分 - 豆丁网 ... court n. 法庭，法院，足球场 ill-mannered a. 态度恶劣的，粗鲁的 deserve v. 应该有，应该受到；值得.

list.abs: he hates those with ill manners ., 他讨厌那些没有礼貌的人.
she hates dating men of ill manners她讨厌和不懂礼节的男人约会
mention ill-mannered children and most people roll their eyes at the memory of ahellion and his boorish parents .一提到无礼的孩子，大多数人都会对记忆中惹是生非的小孩以及其粗鄙的父母皱起眉头。
of course , Mencius was not such a bad man . he simply thought that according to the standards of women's virtue of the time , his wife had been ill-mannered .孟子当然不是这种人，他只是根据那个时代对妇德的标准，认为妻子不知礼。

he may be conceited , ill mannered , presumptuous of fatuous , but I do not turn for dreary cliches ( ? ) about respect for elders as if mere age were a reason for respect .他也许会自以为是，态度恶劣，专横自满，但我并不因此就赞同尊敬长者的陈词滥调--如果仅仅年龄是尊敬的唯一原因。
small minded officials , rude waiters , and ill mannered taxi drivers are hardly unknown in the US .在美国，心胸狭隘的官员，举止粗鲁的招待和缺乏教养的出租车司机也并非罕见。

entry.def: If you describe someone as ill-mannered, you are critical of them because they are impolite or rude.

example.ex: ...this rude, ill-mannered individual who assumes he has the force of the law behind him...
example.tran: 这个粗鲁无礼、态度恶劣的人自以为他拥有法律的支持

example.ex: Chantal would have considered it ill-mannered to show surprise.
example.tran: 钱特尔会认为表现出吃惊是失态的。

sentences.sentence: "resentment flared at such an unmannered intrusion"
